p.k: Lily Glee has a date tonight, and she has not idea what she should wear. Luckily, she can ask her roommate, Tyler Nixon, for his opinions. She shows him her first outfit - a little plaid skirt and crop top, but neither of them are really feeling it so Lily wants to show him her second outfit idea. While she's changing and wearing nothing but her bra and panties, she catches Tyler staring. But she isn't mad - in fact, she was hoping he'd look.
